title: Introduction to C Programming
description: A beginner's guide to programming in the C language, covering basic syntax and control structures.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Learn the fundamentals of algorithms, including sorting, searching, and graph algorithms, with practical examples.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: An introduction to C++ programming language with a focus on data structures and algorithms, ideal for competitive programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Learn essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and stacks, with clear explanations and hands-on exercises.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover the principles of object-oriented programming using Python, with practical examples and real-world applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Explore software engineering principles, including requirements analysis, design patterns, and testing methodologies, for building robust systems.

title: AWS and Cloud Computing
description: Get an overview of Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud computing platform and learn about cloud computing technologies and deployment models.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Introduction to MySQL database management system and SQL, covering database design, querying, and administration.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Develop problem-solving skills through practice and analysis of various problems, with strategies for efficient and effective solutions.
